book.title: GT &shortversion; C Common Libraries : System Administrator's Guide

abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with C Common Libraries. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.

important.simpara: This information is in addition to the basic Globus Toolkit prerequisite, overview, installation, security configuration instructions in the . Read through this guide before continuing!

chapter.title: Building and Installing
chapter.para: For instructions on building and installing GT &shortversion;, see the Installation Guide.

chapter.title: Deploying
chapter.para: The C common libraries are available in any GT &shortversion; installation.

chapter.title: Testing
chapter.para: The C common libraries test suite is included in the globus_common_test package.

chapter.title: Troubleshooting
chapter.para: The C common libraries are intended for use by developers; there are no user level troubleshooting techniques.
